N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2607.1 - Purpose, scope and applicability

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Part is to provide
rules and procedures for the New York State Environmental Facilities

Corporation (corporation) to provide financing to beginning farmers from the

New York Beginning Farmer Loan Program (NYBFLP) created by chapter 366 of the

Laws of 2004. This program is intended to allow beginning farmers to obtain
reduced interest rate loans for qualified purposes by obtaining loan funds from
the proceeds of a tax-exempt bond issued by the corporation. (b) This Part applies to all persons seeking
or receiving financing from the NYBFLP and to the activities of the corporation
in the discharge of its duties relating to the NYBFLP. Notes
